document.full_text: mr. schaefer was a political showman who captivated voters and infuriated critics as the mayor who rejuvenated decaying baltimore and then as maryland's governor and comptroller.
document.title: william schaefer, baltimore mayor, dies at 89
lines_and_colors: mr. schaefer was a political showman who captivated voters and infuriated critics as the mayor who rejuvenated decaying baltimore and then as maryland's governor and comptroller.
